page.title: 19 *** In the news ***
page.content: The local newspaper is called the 'Cumberland and Westmorland Herald', and it is published in Penrith. It has two parts, one that has lots of local news in, and another with mostly adverts for cars and houses in. In the news this week (Sat. 20th July), is an article about the plans to make the fells into an 'area of outstanding natural beauty' by the Countryside commission. Some of the local council do not want this because it might mean some quarries would have to close down. There are also a lot of letters to the editor about the army's plans to buy some more fell to use for training soldiers staying at Warcop training centre.
